Great game but ofcourse it needs to be polished. It's community is not nearly as toxic as one would be told, it is all about your own outlook on the game, and people will defend themselves no matter who they are. I would recommend playing with friends or using the feature to personally select what country the person you are going to play with comes from. Some nationalities don't seem to be so compatible (russians and literally anyone else, except from at the higher ranks). The anti-cheat isn't that great, but cheaters do get banned, it just takes some time for the justice hammer to arrive. In conlusion, the greatest shooter to ever exist, hands down.
Good game, but ban the cheaters and bring back my nvidia color settings
